text: Shankargarh is one of the administrative blocks of Balrampur district, Chhattisgarh state, India. It is located 60 km north east of Ambikapur. Category:Community development blocks in Balrampur district, Chhattisgarh Category:Community development blocks in Chhattisgarh Category:Cities and towns in Balrampur district, Chhattisgarh
title: Shankargarh, Balrampur
